component.name: opera
component.summary: A fast and secure web browser

description.p: Opera is a browser with innovative features, speed and security. The browser delivers a highly customizable start page (Speed Dial) where you can set your top sites and bookmarks, Off-road mode for data saving and faster browsing in slow networks such as 3G/2G and public Wi-Fi, a Discover page for getting the best of the web content.
